# This file was autogenerated by the modm cmake builder. Do not modify!

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15)
include(cmake/ModmConfiguration.cmake)
set_source_files_properties(
  src/modm/platform/core/reset_handler.sx
  PROPERTIES LANGUAGE CXX
)

add_library(modm OBJECT
  ext/gcc/atomic.cpp
  ext/gcc/cabi.c
  ext/gcc/cxxabi.cpp
  ext/gcc/new_delete.cpp
  ext/printf/printf.c
  src/modm/architecture/driver/atomic/flag.cpp
  src/modm/board/board.cpp
  src/modm/container/smart_pointer.cpp
  src/modm/io/iostream.cpp
  src/modm/io/iostream_printf.cpp
  src/modm/math/geometry/angle.cpp
  src/modm/math/geometry/vector2.cpp
  src/modm/math/utils/bit_operation.cpp
  src/modm/math/utils/pc/operator.cpp
  src/modm/platform/clock/rcc.cpp
  src/modm/platform/clock/systick_timer.cpp
  src/modm/platform/core/assert.cpp
  src/modm/platform/core/delay.cpp
  src/modm/platform/core/delay_ns.cpp
  src/modm/platform/core/no_heap.c
  src/modm/platform/core/reset_handler.sx
  src/modm/platform/core/startup.c
  src/modm/platform/core/startup_platform.c
  src/modm/platform/core/vectors.c
  src/modm/platform/gpio/enable.cpp
  src/modm/platform/spi/spi_master_1.cpp
  src/modm/platform/uart/uart_3.cpp
  src/modm/ui/display/character_display.cpp
  src/modm/ui/display/font/all_caps_3x5.cpp
  src/modm/ui/display/font/arcade_classic.cpp
  src/modm/ui/display/font/assertion.cpp
  src/modm/ui/display/font/fixed_width_5x8.cpp
  src/modm/ui/display/font/matrix_8x8.cpp
  src/modm/ui/display/font/numbers_14x32.cpp
  src/modm/ui/display/font/numbers_40x56.cpp
  src/modm/ui/display/font/numbers_46x64.cpp
  src/modm/ui/display/font/scripto_narrow.cpp
  src/modm/ui/display/font/ubuntu_36.cpp
  src/modm/ui/display/graphic_display.cpp
  src/modm/ui/display/graphic_display_fill.cpp
  src/modm/ui/display/graphic_display_text.cpp
  src/modm/ui/display/image/home_16x16.cpp
  src/modm/ui/display/image/logo_eurobot_90x64.cpp
  src/modm/ui/display/image/logo_rca_90x64.cpp
  src/modm/ui/display/image/skull_64x64.cpp
  src/modm/ui/display/virtual_graphic_display.cpp
)
set_source_files_properties(
  ext/printf/printf.c
    TARGET_DIRECTORY modm
  PROPERTIES
    COMPILE_OPTIONS "-Wno-double-promotion;-Wno-overflow"

)

add_library(modm_warnings INTERFACE)
add_library(modm_options INTERFACE)
add_library(modm_arch_options INTERFACE)

modm_target_config_create(modm modm_arch_options modm_options modm_warnings)
target_include_directories(modm SYSTEM
  PUBLIC
  ext
  ext/cmsis/core
  ext/cmsis/device
  ext/gcc
  src
  PRIVATE
)

target_link_libraries(modm
  PUBLIC
    modm_arch_options
  PRIVATE
    project_options
    modm_options
    modm_warnings
  )
